Trade/Device Name(s): Safety Blood Collection Set + Luer Adapter with preattached Blood Culture Holder
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Greiner Bio-One Blood Culture Holder and Safety Blood Collection Set + Luer Adapter with preattached Blood Culture Holder as a device for filling blood into blood culture bottles and tubes during venipuncture.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to fill blood into blood culture bottles and tubes in routine venipuncture procedures by properly trained healthcare professionals.
